Be a good community member, make good use of spaces, encourage people to use private/public space most appropriate for them #mitedp @cicnow
.@cicnow: You pay for min people associated with office plus per person fee. Encourages density within space. Invigorates community. #mitedp
Places that have a bustling innovation community aren't a target - picking places that are nearly there. Rotterdam has a @cicnow hub #mitedp

"Big company has resources, capabilities: can pursue multiple paths, all at same time. Don't face startup constraints." @sstern_mit #mitedp
"Entrepreneurs have been extremely poorly served by adapting big company strategies to startups." @sstern_mit #mitedp
"I would like my workforce to have an entrepreneurial mindset. Called diff things. Intrapreneurship. Internal venture." @sstern_mit #mitedp
